name: World of Wisdom
description:
This is a game made for students studying Accounting & Finance. It teaches you about the Balance Sheet, Income Statement & Cash Flow Statement.

Storyline:

The World of Wisdom is in danger as Demons corrupt all the Wisdom that it once contained. You step into the shoes of the Guardian of Wisdom, who was summoned to restore the balance in this world. In this role, you need to recollect Fragments of Wisdom and consequently defeat the Demons and the Demon King. 

Gameplay:

In order to regain the Fragments of Wisdom you will need to take the various tests of the Sages. These tests revolve around the topics of Balance Sheet, Income Statement & Cash Flow Statement.

With these Fragments of Wisdom you will be granted access to the lairs of the Demons to face them in combat.

Good luck with your quest, Guardian of Wisdom!

For some  extra support, you can download the answers to the tests of the Sages here.

You can use this platform to provide feedback on the game. Mention what you like and dislike about it, as well as any errors/glitches/spelling mistakes that you find. Any feedback will help me to improve the game!!! :)
